body.name: Western Digital 1TB WD Blue SA510 SATA Internal Solid State Drive SSD - SATA III 6 Gb/s, 2.5"/7mm, Up to 560 MB/s - WDS100T3B0A

deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 13. Order within 4 hrs 24 mins
features: Upgrade your creativity with a performance boost that delivers read speeds up to 560MB/s(2) (500GB(1) and 1TB(1) models)..Operating Temperatures : 0 ° C to 70 ° C.
Give your PC new life with capacities of up to 1TB(1) and high endurance, plus low power draw for more laptop life between charges and reduced vibrations compared to HDDs.
Clone your computer’s entire hard drive to your WD Blue SA510 drive with the included Acronis True Image for Western Digital transfer and backup software(3) featuring cyber protection.
The WD Blue SA510 SATA SSD comes in 2.5" and M.2 form factors for increased compatibility, fitting right into many current PC slots as well as those of many older machines.

Three-month trial of Dropbox Professional(4). Get 3TB(1) of storage, send files up to 100GB(1) in size, quickly backup and recover files, add digital watermarks, and secure your work with password protection.

(4) Internet connection required. Redeem by September 30, 2023. Not available in all countries. Limited to 1 per new Dropbox account, subject to applicable Terms of Service. For existing accounts, limitations apply.
body.description: Breathe new life into your PC so you can push your work further and grow your creative potential. Designed specifically for professionals, creatives, freelancers, social influencers, and other passionate content creators and editors, the WD Blue SA510 SATA SSD helps boost your PC’s performance so you can be more productive. The drive is available in 2.5" or M.2 slots and includes Acronis True Image for Western Digital backup and cyber protection software(3) plus a free three-month Dropbox Professional trial(4). This fast, reliable SSD helps you boot up faster, cut lag times, and speed up edits and file transfers for a sustainable desktop upgrade—no expensive new PC purchase required. | (4) Internet connection required. Offer must be redeemed by September 30, 2023, while activation code supplies lasts. Offer limited to 1 per new Dropbox account, subject to acceptance of Dropbox Terms of Service. For existing accounts, limitations apply. See the Dropbox website for details. Western Digital reserves the right to change or discontinue this offer at any time without notice. This offer is not available in all countries.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Share Files with Dropbox Professional Easily send files up to 100GB(2) in only a few clicks, even if it’s too large email. Safeguard your ideas by adding custom branding, digital watermarks, passwords, or expiration dates to any content you share via Dropbox Professional(4).

Upgrade Your Creativity Featuring read speeds up to 560MB/s(1) (500GB-4TB models), this fast SATA SSD delivers a performance boost that keeps up with your workloads so you can stay creative and be more productive. Help Protect Your Content Clone your computer’s hard drive to your WD Blue SA510 drive with the included Acronis True Image for Western Digital software(3). This efficient software also helps provide AI-based protection against ransomware and defend you from many attacks.

Give Your PC a Makeover Why buy an expensive new desktop? With capacities of up to 2TB(2), with high endurance, low power draw, and reduced vibrations compared to HDDs, the WD Blue SA510 SATA SSD is the perfect drive for a powerful PC upgrade.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Drive but Arconis Didn't work
reviews.reviewText: I wanted to add a second SSD to my system as my original Samsung SSD is almost 10 years old. Black Friday sealed the deal. As my home build only had two bays and they were both in use, I bought the Corsair Dual SSD Mounting Bracket which allowed me to put the old SSD and new SSD in the same bay (they stack on top of each other). I also planned to clone the new drive as a boot drive. When I ran the Arconis program (that you download off the WD website) and waited two hours I got a warning from Windows (when I tried to boot) that the new drive was corrupted when I tried to boot from it. I made two attempts. It just wouldn't work. A YouTuber had recommended the trial version of Macrium Reflect cloning software. I downloaded that and followed along on the provided video on their website. Super easy. I did have to go into the BIOS to change the boot order as I left the Samsung in place as a backup drive. Overall the WD drive works perfect but I recommend using Macrium to clone the drive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Space, Little Cost
reviews.reviewText: Awesome cost for a the space the drive offers. No instructions to install, make sure that your computer has the appropriate SATA cables (to motherboard and to power), if the computer doesn't have any you may want to get some. I ended up having to buy BolAAzuL SATA Cable III Right Angle & Straight, 2-Pack SATA Data Cables 90 Degree + SATA 3 Cable Straight to Straight, 6Gbps Tangle-Free SATA Cable 7pin Black with Locking Latch for Hard Drive SSD. After it was in and a few moments on a YouTube video was easy to allocate and format without any issues. PS make sure you are plugging it into the appropriate SATA port.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Quality 1 TB Solid State Drive
reviews.reviewText: This SSD is well made and easy to install. The downloadable cloning software worked well and the performance improvements were very impressive. Data access times were so much faster than the original HDDs in both my laptop and my desktop computers that it was as if I had purchased two new high-performance computers. I highly recommend this option as an upgrade to any computer that is presently using a conventional hard drive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works much faster than standard Laptop drive
reviews.reviewText: I’m new to SSD tech, and my laptop is about 6 years old and was terribly bogged down by Windows 11 background processes — chiefly Windows Search Indexer. So, I thought maybe said I switch out the drives, I won’t have to get an all new computer in these tough economic times.Short story is that it worked eventually, and the drive is much quicker. When I run chkdsk on it, it does stop and say a couple of error were found, so I’m not exactly feeling totally secure in it, but it does seem to function now that I have it installed.It wasn’t till after I opened the Dell laptop that I saw that it has a slot for the other type of SSD that doesn’t have this traditional shape and SATA connector — and I read that those are even faster, the ones that look like a skinny motherboard and.plug into a slot. I would have gone with that style had I known. Oh well.This drive comes with nothing but the drive. So, you’d need a separate USB connector if your laptop only has one drive interface. And then you also have to go to the WD website to download software to do any cloning and backup — it’s called Acronis. And it was tough to work with.If you are trying to clone via USB, then you have to pull out the original drive and hook that up to the USB cable. And then you have to put the new SSD inside the laptop. If you have two slots none of this matters. But the new drive has to be inside of the computer for it to be made bootable on that computer. Allegedly, it will not boot up if you use any exterior cloning devices. The main problem was that it kept saying it was unable to “lock” the new drive. I tried a bunch of stuff and pulled out an ancient PC to try and get it going. I must’ve tried fitty ‘leven different times, but eventually I did hit the correct combination of elements. Pain in the behind, but it is possible.Does not make up for a slow processor or display that doesn’t look very good, and battery that won’t hold a charge — but it has refreshed my ability to get work done. Also, turn off Windows Search Indexer. Stupid waste of resources.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good hard drive!
reviews.reviewText: My PC starts quickly with no glitches. It works better than my disk hard drive. These solid state DDHDs are great! Buy one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for it's purpose
reviews.reviewText: Needed to add a second SSD drive to my Dell computer, so chose this one and so far (several months) it is working fine. Once installed, the computer did not recognize it automatically. I'm not a tech savvy person, but with a bit of an internet search I was able to find out how to get the computer to recognize it and it has been working fine for several months.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Was super easy to install and a very good value for the price. Only negative was the "WD Software" for backups was kind of flaky, but I had a zillion other options to use instead of that.

Reliability of SSDs has been sketchy since 2021. Samsung is no exception and they have one of the worst RMA service ever in Canada. In this context, I chose the next best with a decent RMA service in Canada: Western Digital.So far, I am quite happy with my purchase. It came in perfect health and is still at perfect health after cloning my old Toshiba HDD on it. So far, so good. My SSD is of the newest generation and was manufactured May 23rd 2023. Speed is as advertised. My computer gets to the log in screen much faster and all the background apps load super fast. Games are impacted too, of course. Initial game launch, loading saved games and loading between levels takes half the time it used to take with my old 7200 rpm HDD. Even the graphics are impacted because textures load much quicker.One thing I am not so sure about, though, is the Acronis True Image software that is provided. It is rather clunky and people have had problems cloning with it (errors, having to wipe the SSD and try again), so I decided not to use it, especially after I saw that it would hang for over a minute just when I clicked to bring up the cloning tool. That is NOT normal. If it hangs so much on that step, imagine how it will struggle when doing the actual cloning. I wanted to go with the free version of AOMEI, but apparently they have put their cloning tool behind a paywall. I ended up using Macrium True Reflect (free trial), but there are plenty others which would have done just as nicely. I was able to adjust my partitions exactly to my liking.I hope I got one of the reliable ones and that it will not fail before several years. I will update my review if anything happens.

reviews.reviewTitle: One of the Best Sata SSD
reviews.reviewText: No issues non soever. Much better than than standard HDD. Boot time has reduced, R/W capacity has increased. Unfortunately i have been using using it with SATA SSD type 2 and cannot utilize its full capabilities, but overall everything is much smoother.

reviews.reviewTitle: Buen disco duro a un precio razonable.
reviews.reviewText: Empecé a tener problemas con mi antiguo disco duro en mi pc. Supongo que empezó a fallar de los años y del uso. Porque dentro de la torre no sufre golpes ni nada por el estilo.Es más... dentro está seguro y bien ventilado. Va sujeto con sus 4 tornillos.Antes de que me falle el sistema y pierda mis archivos decidí comprar uno y jubilar mi antiguo disco que es de la misma marca.Me lancé por un producto de segunda mano. Mi experiencia con estos productos es muy buena, ya que siempre los compro si hay en estado "como nuevo" y "muy bueno". Realmente vienen con algún desperfecto en la caja original y poco más. Algo que no me importa, es recibir la caja un poco doblada o rota por algún lado. Ya que el interior está bien y no afecta en su funcionamiento y muchísimas veces no son usados. Lo mejor de todo es que siempre me ahorro un buen dinero.Voviendo al tema del disco duro... He de decir que no pesa mucho, es muy liviano.La verdad es que es buena marca y tengo buena experiencia con estos discos duros.La velocidad de cargar el sistema operativo es buena, bastante rápida. El abrir carpetas y demás también. Todo muy fluido.Espero que me dure otros 7 años como me duró el otro disco duro. Recomiendo la marca y estos modelos en sí.
全くの初心者ですが、YouTubeを見ながら手順通りに進め無事にSSDへ交換出来ました。なかなか立ち上がらないパソコンでしたが、立ち上がりも凄く早くなりサクサク動き快適になりました。

I successfully used this 1TB WD SSD to increase the storage capacity inside my Eufy HomeBase 3.The drive is silent, generates no heat and handles the video disk transfer needs of seven 4K security cameras.Excellent price compared to other options, but more importantly, it works in the Eufy HomeBase 3 without any issues.The SSD’s case has screw positions in exactly the same locations as a traditional 2.5” disk drive, so the SSD can be used in most situations to replace one eg. a laptop.Very highly recommended.
